meanings.definition: A misalignment or incorrect relation between the teeth of the two dental arches when they approach each other as the jaws close.
meanings.sent1: The dentist diagnosed the malocclusion in my teeth.
meanings.sent2: The orthodontist recommended braces to fix the malocclusion.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that my malocclusion makes me look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The malocclusion in the gears of the clock caused it to stop ticking.
meanings.sent5: The malocclusion in the puzzle pieces made it impossible to fit them together.

meanings.definition: A condition in which the teeth of the upper and lower jaws do not meet properly.
meanings.sent1: The dentist explained that my jaw malocclusion could lead to jaw pain.
meanings.sent2: Eating becomes difficult with severe malocclusion of the teeth.
meanings.sent3: The malocclusion in the door made it tricky to close properly.
meanings.sent4: The malocclusion of ideas in his mind hindered his decision-making process.
meanings.sent5: The malocclusion of gears in the machine caused it to malfunction.
